text: The Deer Ridge Correctional Institution is a state prison for men located in Madras, Jefferson County, Oregon, owned and operated by the Oregon Department of Corrections. The facility opened in 2007 and holds a maximum of 1867 inmates, 1223 at medium security and 644 at minimum security. ==References== Category:Prisons in Oregon Category:Buildings and structures in Jefferson County, Oregon Category:2007 establishments in Oregon Category:Madras, Oregon
title: Deer Ridge Correctional Institution
